sentences.sContent: So after that, I decided to use this word to denominate my band.
sentences.sContent_eng: So after that, I decided to use this word to denominate my band.
sentences.sCn: 因此在那之后我决定用这个词命名乐队。

remMethod.val: de + nomin (名字) + ate (表示动词) → 给名字 → 命名

trans.tranOther: to give a specific name to; designate
